text: avanu nimage kāṇuvantaha stambhagaḷilladeyē ākāśavannu sr̥ṣṭisiruvanu – mattu bhūmiyu nim'mondige uruḷi biḍadante avanu adaralli beṭṭagaḷannu neṭṭanu mattu adaralli ella bageya jīvigaḷannu haraḍidanu. Mattu avanu ākāśadinda nīranniḷisi, adaralli (bhūmiyalli) ella bageya (sasya) vargagaḷannu beḷesidanu
